title: Checking If Sequence Is Empty
description: In this lab, you will create a Python function to check if a given value is an empty sequence or collection, such as lists, tuples, sets, dictionaries, strings, and ranges.

meta.title: Python | Empty Sequence or Collection Check
meta.description: Learn how to check if a sequence or collection is empty in Python. Includes a function to handle lists, tuples, sets, dictionaries, strings, and ranges.
meta.keywords: Python, empty, sequence, collection, check, function, list, tuple, set, dictionary, string, range
